title: Bata India is a worthy opponent to USA's CVS.
selftext:
Bought just one simple pair of slippers from Bata. Got a huge ass receipt. I was a bit taken aback. I wasn't even asked if I wanted just the electronic bill. Anyway, CVS has got a new competitor in the deforestation contest.

https://preview.redd.it/f3glyvf5cxt81.png?width=3016&format=png&auto=webp&s=faf7a6c80b26a25be05ae1d9b802693787c83467
